sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, useContext } from 'react' import { Container } from './styles' import incomeImg from '../../assets/income.svg' import outcomeImg from '../../assets/outcome.svg' import totalImg from '../../assets/total.svg' import { TransactionsContext } from '../../TransactionsContext' export const Summary = () => { const { transactions } = useContext(TransactionsContext) const summary = transactions.reduce((acc, transaction) => { if (transaction.type === 'deposit') { acc.deposits += transaction.value acc.total += transaction.value } else { acc.withdrawals += transaction.value acc.total -= transaction.value } return acc }, { deposits: 0, withdrawals: 0, total: 0 }) return(

Entradas

{summary.deposits}

Saídas

- {new Intl.NumberFormat('pt-BR', { style: 'currency', currency: 'BRL' }).format(summary.withdrawals)}

Total

{summary.total}
) }
